channel.title: Got a problem! Help please
channel.description: Hello. So my problem is the source sided. when i am killing any npc in my server, they dont drop anything. I tryed much ways to get them fixed but they still dotn work , so i am worried and now asking for help! how i can fix it to make npcs drop items>? :confused:
